title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The man turned up Colinton Road then eventually down Napier Road. Wide street, big trees, even bigger houses.

title: Bertie Plays the Blues
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: A few days later he had telephoned to tell Matthew to  come up to Colinton Road to examine a car. "It's nothing  to look at, I'm afraid," said George.

title: Friends, Lovers, Chocolate
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She turned the corner and started to walk down her road. Walking towards her, having just parked his car in the street, was one of the students who attended lectures in Colinton Road near by. Isabel caught his eye as they passed.
